name: What's Your Color ?
description:
Finding like minded people is hard. Especially if they are hiding their colors.

Move whit w-a-s-d, make other balls touch each other, press space, mach their colors.

...

This is my first GGJ but please don't hesitate to go hard in the comments so I can improve myself even more.
